title: Factoring a Quadratic Equation
text: To factor a quadratic expression $${ax}^2+bx+c=0$$, the first step is to divide both sides by a.
speech: To factor a quadratic expression  a x squared, plus b x plus c is equal to 0 , the first step is to divide both sides by a.

, the first step is to divide both sides by a.

title: Dividing Both Sides of the Equation
text: After dividing both sides by a, what does the equation turn into?

title: Factoring a Quadratic Equation
text: The second step is to find two numbers, $$p$$ and q, for which $$p q=c$$ and $$p+q=b$$.
speech: The second step is to find two numbers,  p  and q, for which  p q, is equal to, c  and  p, plus q, is equal to b .

title: Rewriting the Expression
speech: Then, rewrite the equation as  parentheses x plus p,  times, parentheses x plus q,  is equal to 0 .

title: Answers of a Quadratic Equation
text: The answers of a quadratic equation are its roots, the $$p$$ and q values that make the expression $$0$$.

title: Significance of $$p$$ and q
speech: When  x is equal to negative p  and -q,  parentheses x plus p,  times, parentheses x plus q,  is equal to 0 .
